targets.queryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.portfolio_risk_quality') AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.max_drawdown_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-365 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.max_drawdown_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-365 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.vol_30d_pct') AS REAL) AS "Vol 30d %" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.vol_30d_pct') AS REAL) AS "Vol 30d %" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.sharpe_1y') AS REAL) AS "Sharpe 1y", CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.sortino_1y') AS REAL) AS "Sortino 1y" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.sharpe_1y') AS REAL) AS "Sharpe 1y", CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.sortino_1y') AS REAL) AS "Sortino 1y" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

panels.title: Drawdown Depth (180d)
panels.description: Underwater plot showing current drawdown depth from peak. Negative values indicate being below the high-water mark.

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_depth_pct') AS REAL) AS "Drawdown Depth %" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_depth_pct') AS REAL) AS "Drawdown Depth %" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.ultimate.sortino_1y') AS REAL) AS sortino_1y, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.ultimate.sharpe_1y') AS REAL) AS sharpe_1y, json_extract(h.value,'$.ultimate.risk_quality_category') AS risk_quality_category FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') h ORDER BY json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_pct') DESC LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.ultimate.sortino_1y') AS REAL) AS sortino_1y, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.ultimate.sharpe_1y') AS REAL) AS sharpe_1y, json_extract(h.value,'$.ultimate.risk_quality_category') AS risk_quality_category FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') h ORDER BY json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_pct') DESC LIMIT 10;
